title: Twisted murder.
abstract: Detective Alex is looking forward to his impending nuptials, until he receives a shocking phone call revealing that his soon-to-be wife has been murdered. Who would want to kill beautiful Melinda? Was it a case of mistaken identity, or did she have a double life? Did he even know the woman he was to marry? With nothing to go on, Alex desperately tries to piece the mystery together. The journey takes him to the seedy underworld of Fresno, where a series of twisted clues and heavy drinking lead him to her unlikely, possibly inhuman, killer and an even more twisted romantic ending.
